hero.title: Professional Real Estate Photo Editing
hero.subtitle: Stunning, high-quality images that sell properties faster. First edit is on us!

services.name: Single Exposure
services.description: Basic enhancements including color correction, sharpening, and lens distortion removal for a clean, vibrant look.

services.name: HDR Merge
services.description: We blend multiple exposures to create a single, perfectly lit image with balanced light and vibrant colors.

services.name: Flash
services.description: The ultimate technique for natural, crisp, and color-accurate interior photos by combining ambient light with flash shots.

services.name: AI Enhancement
services.description: Leverage AI for automated enhancements like sky replacement, lighting adjustments, and color grading for stunning results in seconds.

services.name: Video Editing
services.description: Professional cuts, color grading, and stabilization for engaging property tours that captivate buyers.

services.name: Object Removal
services.description: Declutter your shots by seamlessly removing unwanted objects, from cords to furniture, for a cleaner final image.

services.name: Virtual Staging
services.description: Transform empty rooms into beautifully furnished spaces that attract more buyers and help them visualize their future home.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.description: We are a dedicated team of editors who use wheelchairs. Our passion for this work comes from the fact that it is not only what we excel at, but also what helps us sustain ourselves and provide for our families. With years of experience and exceptional skills, we are committed to delivering the highest-quality results tailored to your needs — with the best speed and pricing in the market.

features.title: Fast Turnaround
features.description: Get your edited photos back within 12-24 hours, so you can list your properties sooner.

features.title: Quality Results
features.description: Our meticulous process ensures every detail is perfect, from color correction to window pulls.

features.title: Affordable Pricing
features.description: Top-tier editing services at competitive prices to maximize your return on investment.

testimonials.quote: I’ve used their HDR editing service multiple times and the results are always consistent. The photos look bright, natural, and professional — exactly what I was hoping for!
testimonials.author: Sarah L.

testimonials.quote: The turnaround speed really impressed me. I sent a large batch and got everything back the next day with perfect edits. Reliable and easy to work with.
testimonials.author: Mark S.

testimonials.quote: Their attention to detail is outstanding. Every correction was spot on, and the final images looked better than I expected. Highly recommended.
testimonials.author: Emily R.
